Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html#/s:13W.name: storyboardId
Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html#/s:13W.abstract: Identifier used to retrieve the UIViewController from storyboard.

Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html#/s:13W.name: init(coder:with:)
Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html#/s:13W.abstract: Creates the specified view controller from the storyboard and initializes it using your custom initialization code.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.name: WorkflowInput
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.abstract: The type of data coming into the FlowRepresentable; defaulted to Never; Nevermeans the FlowRepresentable will ignore data passed in from the Workflow.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.name: WorkflowOutput
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.abstract: The type of data passed forward from the FlowRepresentable; defaulted to Never; Never means data will not be passed forward.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.name: _workflowPointer
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.abstract: A pointer to the AnyFlowRepresentable that erases this FlowRepresentable; will automatically be set.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.name: shouldLoad()
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.abstract: Returns a Boolean indicating the Workflow should load the FlowRepresentable; defaults to true.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.name: proceedInWorkflow(_:)
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.abstract: Moves forward while passing arguments forward in the Workflow; if at the end, calls the onFinish closure used when launching the workflow.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.name: proceedInWorkflow()
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.abstract: Moves forward in the Workflow; if at the end, calls the onFinish closure used when launching the workflow.

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.name: abandonWorkflow(animated:onFinish:)
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html#/s:8Wor.abstract: Called when the current workflow should be terminated, and the app should return to the point before the workflow was launched

Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html.name: FlowRepresentable
Protocols/FlowRepresentable.html.abstract: A component in a Workflow; should be independent of the workflow context.

Protocols/OrchestrationResponder.html.name: OrchestrationResponder
Protocols/OrchestrationResponder.html.abstract: A type capable of responding to Workflow actions.

Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html.name: StoryboardLoadable
Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html.abstract: A protocol indicating this a FlowRepresentable that should be loaded from a storyboard.

Classes/UIKitPresenter.html#/s:13Workflo.name: abandon(_:onFinish:)
Classes/UIKitPresenter.html#/s:13Workflo.abstract: Abandons the Workflow by dismissing all UIViewController‘s currently displayed by this presenter.

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.name: default
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.abstract: The default presentation style chosen by the system.

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.name: fullScreen
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.abstract: A presentation style in which the presented view covers the screen.

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.name: pageSheet
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.abstract: A presentation style that partially covers the underlying content.

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.name: formSheet
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.abstract: A presentation style that displays the content centered in the screen.

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.name: currentContext
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.abstract: A presentation style where the content is displayed over another view controller’s content.

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.name: custom
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.abstract: A custom view presentation style that is managed by a custom presentation controller and one or more custom animator objects.

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.name: overFullScreen
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.abstract: A view presentation style in which the presented view covers the screen.

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.name: overCurrentContext
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.abstract: A presentation style where the content is displayed over another view controller’s content.

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.name: popover
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.abstract: A presentation style where the content is displayed in a popover view.

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.name: automatic
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.abstract: The default presentation style chosen by the system.

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType.htm.name: navigationStack
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType.htm.abstract: Indicates a FlowRepresentable should be launched in a navigation stack of some kind (For example with UIKit this would use a UINavigationController)

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType.htm.name: init(rawValue:)
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType.htm.abstract: Creates a PresentationType from a LaunchStyle, or returns nil if no mapping exists.

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.name: ModalPresentationStyle
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType/Mod.abstract: Modal presentation styles available when presenting view controllers.

Classes/LaunchStyle.html#/s:8Workflow11L.name: default
Classes/LaunchStyle.html#/s:8Workflow11L.abstract: The launch style used if you do not specify one; behavior is dependent on responder.

Classes/LaunchStyle.html#/s:8Workflow11L.name: new
Classes/LaunchStyle.html#/s:8Workflow11L.abstract: A new instance of LaunchStyle; only use for extending cases of LaunchStyle.

Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType.htm.name: PresentationType
Classes/LaunchStyle/PresentationType.htm.abstract: A type indicating how a FlowRepresentable should be presented.

Classes/FlowRepresentableMetadata.html#/.name: init(_:launchStyle:flowPersistence:)
Classes/FlowRepresentableMetadata.html#/.abstract: Creates an instance that holds onto metadata associated with the FlowRepresentable.

Classes/FlowPersistence.html#/s:8Workflo.name: default
Classes/FlowPersistence.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: Indicates a FlowRepresentable in a Workflow should persist based on its shouldLoad function.

Classes/FlowPersistence.html#/s:8Workflo.name: persistWhenSkipped
Classes/FlowPersistence.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: Indicates a FlowRepresentable in a Workflow who’s shouldLoad function returns false should still be persisted in the workflow.

Classes/FlowPersistence.html#/s:8Workflo.name: removedAfterProceeding
Classes/FlowPersistence.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: Indicates a FlowRepresentable in a Workflow who’s shouldLoad function returns true should be removed from the workflow after proceeding forward.

Classes/FlowPersistence.html#/s:8Workflo.name: new
Classes/FlowPersistence.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: A new instance of FlowPersistence; only use for extending cases of FlowPersistence.

Classes/FlowPersistence.html#/s:8Workflo.name: hiddenInitially
Classes/FlowPersistence.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: Indicates a FlowRepresentable in a Workflow who’s shouldLoad function returns false should be persisted in the workflow for backwards navigation.

Classes/LinkedList/Node/Value.html.name: Value
Classes/LinkedList/Node/Value.html.abstract: A typealias that is equivalent to the specialized type in the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.name: value
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: The concrete value the node is holding onto

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.name: next
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: An optional reference to the next node in the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.name: previous
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: An optional reference to the previous node in the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList/Node/TraversalDirecti.name: TraversalDirection
Classes/LinkedList/Node/TraversalDirecti.abstract: An enumeration indicating whether you’d like to traverse forwards or backwards through the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.name: traverse(_:)
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: A method to move N spaces forwards or backwards through the nodes

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.name: traverse(direction:until:)
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: A method to move forward through the nodes until a precondition is met

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.name: traverseToEnd()
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: A method to move forward through the nodes until there is no next

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.name: traverseToBeginning()
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: A method to move backwards through the nodes until there is no previous

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.name: position
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: A computed property that calculates a nodes position in the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.name: copy()
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html#/s:8Workflo.abstract: Creates an exact replica of the node, including the next and previous values, this essentially deep copies the entire LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: startIndex
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: The beginning index of the linked list (0 indexed)

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: endIndex
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: The last index in the list

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: description
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: A property indicating what to show when the LinkedList is printed.

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: isEmpty
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: A boolean to indicate whether the linked list contains any values

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: count
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: The last index in the list

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: first
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: The first node in the list

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: last
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: The last node in the list

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: init(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: A LinkedList can be instantiated simply by providing the first node in the list

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: append(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Appends a new node to the end of the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: append(contentsOf:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Appends a collection of nodes to the end of the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: insert(_:atIndex:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Inserts a new node at a specified location

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: insert(contentsOf:at:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Inserts a sequences of new nodes at a specified location

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: remove(at:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Removes a node at the specified index

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: remove(where:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Removes a node at the specified index

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: removeFirst(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Removes the first n nodes from the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: removeLast(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Removes the last n nodes from the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: popLast()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Removes the last n nodes from the LinkedList and returns the removed concrete type

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: removeAll()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Removes all nodes from the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: swapAt(_:_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Swaps the concrete values of 2 nodes

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: replace(atIndex:withItem:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Replaces the concrete value of the node at the specified index

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: reverse()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: reverse: Reverse the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: sort(by:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Sorts the linkedList

Classes/LinkedList/Node.html.name: Node
Classes/LinkedList/Node.html.abstract: LinkedList.Node: A type to hold onto elements in a LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: reversed()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Return a new version of the LinkedList with all elements reversed

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: replacing(atIndex:withItem:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Return a new version of the LinkedList with a specific element replaced

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: sorted(by:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Return a new sorted version of the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: dropFirst(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Return a new version of the LinkedList without the first n items

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: dropLast(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Return a new version of the LinkedList without the last n items

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: drop(while:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Return a new version of the LinkedList without the last n items

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: prefix(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Return a new version of the LinkedList with just the first n items

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: prefix(while:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Return a new version of the LinkedList with just the first n items

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: suffix(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Return a new version of the LinkedList with just the last n items

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: sort()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Sorts the linked list in place using a merge sort

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: sorted()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: A non-mutating sort method

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: max()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Returns the maximum value in the comparable LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: min()
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Returns the minimum value in the comparable LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.name: contains(_:)
Classes/LinkedList.html#/s:8Workflow10Li.abstract: Returns a boolean indicating whether the given value is present in the LinkedList

Classes/LinkedList.html.name: LinkedList
Classes/LinkedList.html.abstract: LinkedList: A sequence type used to create a doubly linked list

Classes/FlowPersistence.html.name: FlowPersistence
Classes/FlowPersistence.html.abstract: An extendable class that indicates how a FlowRepresentable should be persisted.

Classes/FlowRepresentableMetadata.html.name: FlowRepresentableMetadata
Classes/FlowRepresentableMetadata.html.abstract: Data about a FlowRepresentable. Used to make an OrchestrationResponder.

Classes/LaunchStyle.html.name: LaunchStyle

Classes/Workflow.html.name: Workflow
Classes/Workflow.html.abstract: A doubly linked list of FlowRepresentableMetadatas; used to define a process.

Classes/UIWorkflowItem.html.name: UIWorkflowItem
Classes/UIWorkflowItem.html.abstract: UIWorkflowItem: A subclass of UIViewController designed for convenience. This does NOT have to be used, it simply removes some of the overhead that normally comes with a FlowRepresentable.
